nts:with-parameter.name: scenarioDescription
nts:with-parameter.value: Verstrekkingsverzoek basale inhoud - andere elementen, alle subscenario's (Antwoord: bericht met 2 verstrekkingsverzoeken)

nts:with-parameter.name: additionalDescription
nts:with-parameter.value: Known issue: the server responds with an extra DispenseRequest instance (with identifier value 'MBH_920_toelichting_VV_extra'), which is not available in the qualification scripts.
